00029 #ifndef NETWORK_PACKET_IDENTIFICATION_H
00030 #define NETWORK_PACKET_IDENTIFICATION_H
00031 
00032 #include "netpacketbase.h"
00033 
00034 namespace RainbruRPG{
00035   namespace Network{
00036 
00043     typedef enum tNetworkClientType{
00044       NCT_FLOODER    =0x01, //<! The client is a flooder
00045       NCT_EDITOR     =0x02, //<! The client is an editor
00046       NCT_GAME       =0x03, //<! The client is a flooder
00047       NCT_UNKNOWN    =0x99  //<! Not yet set
00048     };
00049 
00057     typedef union npIdentificationData{
00059       struct {
00067         guint16 packetIdentifier;
00073         guint16 clientType; 
00074       };
00076       enet_uint8 data[4];
00077     };
00078 
00085     class npIdentification : public NetPacketBase{
00086     public:
00087       npIdentification();
00088       npIdentification(tNetworkClientType);
00089 
00090       ~npIdentification();
00091 
00092       void setClientType(tNetworkClientType);
00093       tNetworkClientType getClientType();
00094 
00095       virtual void netSerialize();
00096       virtual void netDeserialize();
00097       virtual enet_uint8* getData();
00098       virtual size_t getDataLength();
00099       virtual void setData(enet_uint8*, size_t);
00100 
00101       const char* clientTypeToString(tNetworkClientType);
00102 
00103     private:
00105       npIdentificationData* data;
00107       tNetworkClientType clientType;
00108     };
00109 
00110   }
00111 }
